response: Welcome to Ola Scooter family, featuring the S1 and S1 Air families. The S1 family, with its powerful 8.5 kW motor, offers the best design, technology, and performance. It includes the OLA S1 Pro, OLA S1 with 3 kWh battery, and OA S1 with 2 kWh battery. The S1A family introduces the new S1Air in 3 variants, each with unique specifications. If you're looking for a stylish, powerful scooter for city travel, the new S1 with 2 kWh battery is a great affordable option. Booking starts from 9th February with deliveries in March 2023. Thank you.
title: L1.1.6 OLA Scooters Family.mp4
